website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S2's brilliant screen, plentiful storage capacity and slender build make it a great tablet for everyday use at home or on the go.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 has bright and vividly colorful screen
Its rail-thin design is comfortable and ultracompact
It comes with 32GB of storage, a microSD card expansion slot and fingerprint scanner
cons: Unlike previous models, there's no IR blaster

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Tablet that Works!
customer_reviews.text: I had kept buying Kindle Tablets as they were cheap and I couldnt afford them, but started having more issues with them. I finally had enough, saved up, researched and bought this one. My only regret is not doing it sooner! It works incredibly fast, had Mircosoft Works/Excel/PowerPoint, plus I can still access everything I bought on Amazon. I haven't had any issues at all. If need be, I could always get microSD cards to add on to the storage. The sound and picture is phenomenal, better than Kindle and the camera works better as well. It is easier to find things, ,of a things around, and with additional buttons, I'm less confused.
customer_reviews.author: butterflyminxs64

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet for about two years. At first I was very happy with it. However, over time it has developed several problems. The battery drains really fast. From a full charge, after just reading a number of web pages, it goes down dramatically, unlike other tablets I have had. Also, it has become progressively more unresponsive, even after rebooting numerous times, and it constantly freezes. It is very hard just to read a few news articles and has become extremely frustrating. Not sure if a factory reset will help but may try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great looking tablet. Fast. Crisp. Excellent software. But.. constant reboot. I exchange it and 2nd tablet does the exact same thing. Nothing modified. Tablet stays home. And I'm a big Samsung fan. But u have to be honest here. Stay away. This tablet sucks!! 3rd tablet. Stuck on Samsung logo.
customer_reviews.author: nj_rams_fan

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: The tablet I received wasn't even the same model number. An AT&T tablet is model# SM-817A but the one I received was SM-817W. The tablet could not even recognize my AT&T sim. Even took it to AT&T they couldn't get it to work. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: KMC

customer_reviews.title: Reliability is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this tablet. The reviews were good and screen is very nice. It is built solid. That said, reliability is an issue. For instance, google "Samsung spinning lock" and get an eye full. The first tablet I had worked once. The second time I tried to power it up, I got the spinning lock icon. Several calls to Samsung provided no relief and the tablet could neither be turned on or off. I received a replacement which worked for about 6 weeks before this happened again. It's very frustrating to have to load your profile and videos more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy in SF

customer_reviews.title: Dying after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months this tablet is dying -- it charges only intermittently, even on high-end Anker chargers and cables that work perfectly for all my other devices. Samsung support is asking me to mail it to them for examination, leaving me without the use of my tablet for an unknown extended period of time. They were unable to tell me if there would be any fee for the service. If I had known this was the type of support I'd get for a defective device I would not have considered buying a Samsung product online.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis64

customer_reviews.title: Speaker issues/battery issues... Works tho.
customer_reviews.text: Once battery level goes below ten percent it drops quickly. It works, however the position of the speaker is not good and it's not loud enough. If I rest the tablet on my chest or stomach, which I always do, the speaker, which is on the bottom, is against my chest or stomach and I can't hear it. Therefore, I have to turn the tablet upside to do that and sometimes it doesn't work as well because the touch screen bottoms are on the top, which sometimes get unknowingly touch. Just put the speak on the top front... Isn't that common sense? Never understood why the speakers on tablets and phones are in such odd, unusable places.
customer_reviews.author: Real person, fake name

customer_reviews.title: ... AT&T system with no problems and DTV now works great on it
customer_reviews.text: I received the SM-T818W but it works on AT&T system with no problems and DTV now works great on it. I love the tablet, crisp clean graphics and much faster than my old tablet.
customer_reviews.author: NCreloader

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet. MicroSD card slot is a royal pain.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. It is the perfect size, it's FAST and it fits seamlessly with the other Samsung products. Screen is gorgeous. However, when I went to install the microsd card, the slot would not open. After following the directions, looking online and a call to Samsung, we found a trick. Firstly, use a large paper clip and firmly press in the tiny hole until it clicks. The slot may have released BUT it's almost impossible to grasp it to open. Take a length of thread and slip in under the outside edge of the slot and work it back towards the hole. At that point, it should be possible to lever it open. Worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: MamasLlama

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I bought it was the long battery life, but it doesn't meet its expectations. I use it for social media and some simple card games and after 5-6 hours the battery is empty. Before I had a Nexus, which lasted almost twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at this and the S3 tablet. They were basically the same but this one was a lot cheaper cause the S3 was newer. I just needed this to watch movies when I'm on travel. But it's pretty fast and it's super thin. I'm sure I would have been happier with the S3 cause it probably does more things and is newer and faster but this did what I needed. Sound is kinda low and it doesn't do the wireless charge thing. But it's all good
customer_reviews.author: Morton Inc.

customer_reviews.title: 3 year later and still working perfect. Perfect travel size tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: SD card slot. This is really important and is a must in any tablet someone would consider buying. Paying ridiculous prices for minimal storage is stupid. This tablet was the perfect size for me for traveling and school work. Now that I'm done with school, I just use it for videos and smart home automation things. UI speed is still holding up in 2020. Will probably buy again if mine every breaks now that it outlived the warranty. Cons: Make sure you don't lose the original charger. Third party ones I've used resulted in the tablet heating up near the charging port.
customer_reviews.author: A person

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain, does what we got it for :)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 6 year old. He uses it for educational apps and playing some games. The parental settings were fast and easy to set up along with an applock to keep him from getting into settings or some apps without supervision. Screen is clear and movies/cartoons play well. Speakers are ok, prefer to use a headset for sound. Hands down feel this tablet is better than the ipad we also have. Battery life is good and with a screen protector and case it's survived a lot of bumps that would have ended in a wrecked tablet.
customer_reviews.author: TheArtisticRat

customer_reviews.title: Problems with electronics are hard to rectify.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a galaxy tab I dropped. The one I received is gray not black. I've been using it for two weeks and find it doesn't work as well as my old one. Emails won't open. There is a jerky movement to the screen occasionally. I'm not happy with it but because I didn't double check that it was the correct one as described, threw away packing and have been using it I assume there is no way to return it. its my error so I will use it till it dies and buy a replacement locally.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: BLOATWARE, DOUBLE TAP WORKS STRANGELY
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this tablet EXCEPT for the way the SD card works, all the bloatware, and the double tap doesn't work the same as my phone, it is a 'tap, touch and hold, then it takes you somewhere you didn't expect, VERY aggravating. Otherwise, Beautiful screen, very touch sensitive, very responsive, quick change of apps. I really, really wanted to love this tablet. Looking for another one that works the way I want it to, the way it should, and NO BLOATWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: There are limitations to tablet but great device as supplement to desktop.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Have an old tablet that was outdated. Tried an Apple mini 4 but couldn't get it to function even with help of Apple tech support. Read several reviews and concluded Samsung would best meet my needs. So far great. Using it to write this review. Size is just right for use at kitchen table as I check emails and access web sites, Google searches etc. Great for travel. I have access to my desktop and laptop for more involved tasks. Supplements them nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ed John

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my wife's older slower tablet. My wife just started using a Samsung phone, so we stayed with the same interface that this tablet brings. This thing is so much faster then her old tablet and she is enjoying the additional speed. Since this thing is so much faster, she does not even hesitate to pick this thing up to browse or keep family recipes. Battery life is long and charges quickly. An outstanding tablet overall.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the $250 I paid, I can't think of another tablet that gives you as much as this one does. And that Super AMOLED display is impressive; it's sharp, it's vivid and blacks are really BLACK. Performance is good, too, though the cameras on this thing are pretty mediocre. I love how thin and light this is, but I put it in a case immediately because the plastic back looks like it will scratch all too easily. The expandable storage is nice; I added a 32GB card and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: mLo68

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: After a number of calls to cellular company the phone access and cellular outside the home internet finally works. The tablet has a nice size screen and battery life. I am quite pleased with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: acferran

customer_reviews.title: reliable
customer_reviews.text: Moderately powerful, very reliable tablet in an attractive compact package. A beautiful display with deep black and great colors. Battery life is disappointing as is the Samsung bloatware and occasional redirects to try to sell you something.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Good Price.  Lightweight Tablet.  Less Wrist Pain.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lighter tablet than my old one to eliminate wrist and finger pain from extended use. This tablet (Galaxy Tab S2) is light. I attached this tablet strap which also reduces pain.
customer_reviews.author: Stair Climber

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.text: It does everything as promised. Absolute I "moved up" from a 2nd generation Nexus 7. This has the same Android version (6.01) but a faster processor and better screen. It has a 4x3 aspect screen so the body is wider in your hands. The body is slim and light. It's not yet my "go to" tablet until I get used to the placement of the buttons ala Samsung. Still, it's a Samsung tablet at a rock bottom price,
customer_reviews.author: Rob in the Ridge

customer_reviews.title: WiFi Disconnect Problems
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I detest Apple stuff! It works OK at times but has a problem where WiFi stops working. Found many problems with this on several online discussion boards. I now use it mainly with the Kindle app to read books. Dis appointed also with battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: A very nice little tablet
customer_reviews.text: A very nice little tablet ,great colors on screen pretty fast and light.. This unit also has the Newer Blutooth Aptex 4.2 higher resolution for your music Which works great with my wireless to my digital converter, many headphones have this now also. Forget the iPad those idiots didnot include Aptex with Any of their tablets ,but on imac, and their mac tv.How stupid is that . They want to force you into buyjng their crappy headphones,Not me.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Letteri

customer_reviews.title: Sluggish right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Have been very disappointed with this tablet from day one; has been freezing up since it's first day out of the box; the touch seems off, plus there was only one update available towards the android; my old Samsung Galaxy Note 3 phone runs smoother than this tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Sharby ~ The Beautiful Berkshires

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 8" tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great! It has a super high resolution (2048x1536) and very sharp screen, a very powerful processor, 32 GB storage, and can expand using a microSD card (up to 128 GB). To top it off, it only weighs 9.3 oz. Who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: BozemanMark

customer_reviews.title: Typically unreliable Samsung product
customer_reviews.text: This lasted three years then the screen died. I also have a 128 gb flash drive from Samsung that has problems copying files and connecting to devices. On the other hand, I have an Amazon tablet from 2014 that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: mcls2008

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Tab S2 8.0
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet! This is an upgrade from my 2 older tablets, one of which was also a Samsung. Very responsive and quick. Great screen. Great size; small enough to easily hold, but big enough to be able to read books or view Web pages easily. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: E N

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first tablet I've ever owned. Very impressed with the performance and an easy transition from my Galaxy 8 phone. The finger print reader works great, usually the first time and makes it simple to unlock.
customer_reviews.author: John Murtari

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tab S2. I was seriously considering a Google Pixel C. But decided to save $200 as I didn't need a tablet that was like a laptop, but just a small, thin form tablet that I can use when lounging around the house or traveling for work. It is quick and zippy. Does everything I need and with a good sized SD card, carries all the entertainment I could want for my trips. It replaced my aging Nexus 7 and was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: wyomingpr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It has a great battery life. It's a solidly made unit with a tough screen. I've been very happy with the Samsung tab2. The color on it is and it also is a really good reader for E-books. The Processor is fast enough to keep up with video. Watching TV or movies on it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: Good size with great screen. I really like the size. For me the wifi is slow. On my S8 I get 300 mbs - on the S2 only 100 mbs. I got it because I used my phone and it a little small. I like it - it is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: William B Winfield

customer_reviews.title: I have several other Samsung products and love them. I'm just not sure this tablet is ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this tablet the battery became very hot after 10 minutes of use. I put it up and am now a little hesitant to try again. I have several other Samsung products and love them. I'm just not sure this tablet is one of their better products. I will probably put it on a shelf and leave it there.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got it to compliment my Nexus 7 (2013) which is the best tablet ever. The Samsung Tab S2 8 inch tablet is right behind it. Still a great tablet too!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hunt

customer_reviews.title: This works great as an addition to my computer because it has ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great as an addition to my computer because it has Microsoft Word and syncs all of my information. This allows me to leave my laptop at home and use this in its place while at school for example. It was worked great for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Arkie

customer_reviews.title: You can download a Japanese keyboard that works fine. I keep everything (all the data I use) ...
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove mine. I use it for watching streaming video (Netflix or VRV), reading downloaded manga, and surfing. If you need to write in Japanese, no problem. You can download a Japanese keyboard that works fine. I keep everything (all the data I use) on a chip in the “expansion” slot, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: ez

customer_reviews.title: Wow is it slim
customer_reviews.text: VERY slim. Fantastic picture. Speakers are weak, but not terrible. It performs excellent with games I play, and has solid battery life when I'm reading. Anyway, it's a semi-flagship samsung, so you know what you are going for. Just root it & run lineageOS on it. No Samsung bloat, and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for using DJI Go app.
customer_reviews.text: Much improved with 7.0 nougat operating system, fast, easy to operate! Easily connects and operates DJIGO app for use with my DJI phanton 3 standard quadcopter. Very fast lag free video. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Old but hip

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. Wanted the new S3 but couldn't justify the cost for what I do with mine, but have no regrets over ordering this one. Picture is great, battery life is good, seems to load much quicker than my old one ever did (tab A). Like the size compared to the larger model, easier to pack around and better for games IMO
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: An excellent tablet, apart from a few minor inconveniances
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, the tablet is very good, with plenty of processing power and memory to run whatever apps I ask it to. The touch screen is very responsive, the display excellent. My only quibble so far is that, unless there's a way that I have not yet found, I am required to log in before I can switch the device to airplane mode, turn off WiFi, or shut the system down (which is a nuisance if you are on a plane and have just been told that all electronics should now be in airplane mode or switched off, or if the judge has just entered the courtroom).
customer_reviews.author: MichaelW

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. Fast. Great battery. Compact. No issues whatsoever. So much better than the Nexus 9 it replaced. I know the Tab S3 is out, but knowing what I know now about this one I would never pay the difference for the upgrade. This one just works.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: I was weary of getting this instead of the S3 but im happy with it. Great picture quality and doesnt lag at all despite that i have over 100 apps on it. Batter life is pretty decent and it charges at a decent rate.
customer_reviews.author: Nate M.

customer_reviews.title: Best 8" tablet out right now!
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I've ever had, and I've had at least a dozen to date. The screen is unparalleled, bright, crisp, and everything looks stunning! Battery usually lasts all day long. Tablet has enough horsepower to complete pretty much any task you can throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: kjy2010

customer_reviews.title: Good size, decent price for performance.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace my Samsung tab pro 8.4" and am not disapointed. It's still supported by Samsung and is running Android 7, the amoled display is amazing, it's light and sized for portability and it's a very fast and responsive device. I don't like the SD card slot, and wish it still had led flash and an ir blaster, but that's just personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Svpracer98

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I demand of a Wi-Fi Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced my old LG GPad GPE tablet with this perfectly sized Samsung Tab S2 tablet. Faster, awesome screen.Battery easily lasts all day even if using it hard watching YouTube videos. A bit older (1 year old tech) technology, but does everything I ask it to do. And I have no concerns about any "explosive/fire" concerns with it as it is tried and true for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: Solid tablet
customer_reviews.text: Solid tablet overall. I wish it were possible to have it shipped without any of Samsung's bloatware, though. The battery degrades relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit.  Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Screen is very readable. Unit is a good size. Good resolution. One quirk is you sometimes have to restart it to get networking to start again. I think there is a pending patch. My girlfriend is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: cyburbanyte

customer_reviews.title: S2 awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I own all kinds of Samsung tablets because we all know Samsung is hot right now. Ha ha. But that doesn't scare me. They make a great product. I own a Tab S which is wonderful. So I compulsively thought I should get an S2. They are both great products. The S2 8.0 fits in your hand great, takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: 8" Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is the perfect size to pack in my purse and take to work on down time. Not too small yet not to big.
customer_reviews.author: Carleen

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Samsung galaxy tablet😍
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Samsung galaxy Android tablet. Fast and beautiful clear picture. Had to watch the Olympic women's gymnastics finals this week because our cable company decided it was time to update our box. My husband was very impressed so much so that he decided to upgrade our TV to get this kind of resolution.😍
customer_reviews.author: Maria del Pilar

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet. It lasts.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has held up well. The battery has lasted for years. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my tablet whether it's for Netflix or writing - would buy again! Sharp picture , good touch screen - love my tablet .
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lyon

customer_reviews.title: light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: best cost efficient tablet out there, I hate samsung because the customer service is a nightmare. I did an exception with this tablet because after a lot of research is the best for your money. And the quality and light weight surprise me.
customer_reviews.author: Everardo Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: I use this tablet as a remote in my theater room using Anymote. It serves its intended purpose well for the most part and there's rarely any lag. The screen resolution is also really good. The only issue I occasionally get is sometimes it will reboot for no reason whatsoever. Fortunately, this is very rare and it may very well be do to a poorly written app.
customer_reviews.author: SGR

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. It is snappy in its performance - best tablet I have owned for handling today's apps and content. Great size. Screen size it a little odd (4:3 not 16:9). But other than that it is great for reading, surfing the web, watching movies, taking notes, etc.. It has met or surpassed all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive advertising of product
customer_reviews.text: False representation. Item received was not what I paid for OR what was advertised. I purchase a Samsung S2 which comes standard with 32gb and amoled display. Tablet received had an available space of 1.4gb. Charger received took over an hour to charge 16%. What a shame Vendor and AMAZON advertising a product and shipping an inferior one. Item will be returned tomorrow and I expect a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthy iPad mini replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Being in the IT business I've seen a wide variety of devices over the years. I've been an iPhone iPad user since iPhone 3 and first generation iPad. But I've grown weary with minor bugs and hickups on Apple devices so I made the switch. I find the Galaxy devices responsive and well thought out. I know i will miss the tight integration with iTunes but even iTunes is starting to be a pain as they upgrade it. So not a hands down throw your iPad away but if it's time to trade for a new device I would recommend this be on your list of check it out devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good 8" tablet
customer_reviews.text: Performed better than Asus tablet I am replacing, unfortunately you can't get one with pure android. Battery life is reasonable and lasts easily thru a movie. Gets a little warm with some more intense apps. To me, best in the less $400 price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Android Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung Tab3 8 inch tablet and loves it. It was time for an upgrade and I wanted to stay with a Samsung since I have also a Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge phone. This Tab S2 has been easy to manage and carry wherever I travel. I wpuld recommend it over the larger version for portability and cost.Thanks
customer_reviews.author: GDR

customer_reviews.title: This is a great device we love it
customer_reviews.text: This device is great. We can watch movies, play games. Take pictures & videos. We bought two and love them !
customer_reviews.author: SMPmomOf3

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a 2013 Google Nexus 7. It's a great operating tablet. I research products quite a bit, and this came out as the victor.
customer_reviews.author: ZRreviews

customer_reviews.title: Great for playing games or watching movies
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is a huge upgrade in speed from the Tab 4. Much snappier start time and app load time. Great for playing games or watching movies. Thinner and lighter than the Tab 3 or Tab 4. Seems to also have a significantly longer battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First one didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The first one was not working. It would freeze and restart continuously. Thus taking the point off for the device. I do like the size of this device and the image quality appears spot on.
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Bought this at a decent price-point since Samsung wasn't bringing ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at a decent price-point since Samsung wasn't bringing out a 2017, 8.0". Needed the 32GB, internal storage for app control. Had 16GB internal storage in the past--which is not enough when dealing with apps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: It's my second Samsung tablet. It's OK, but audio has a lot to be desired. Some changes are annoying ... why change to a portrait format? Definitely get the 32 GB.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cross

customer_reviews.title: probably the best 8" tablet with 4
customer_reviews.text: probably the best 8" tablet with 4:3 format screen. So much better than 16:9. Android doesn't let you change screen resolution, so if you use wireless display (miracast), you will get black bars on a 16:9 TV. Same issue with a displayLink usb adaptor. My phone does not have this issue. I basically never use wireless display though so not a big deal. Perfect for net surfing and the fingerprint sensor is incrredibly convenient for logging into sites. Chrome doesn't integrate with fingeprint readers, so I basically never use chrome on this tablet. The built in samsung browser is more capable than chrome (can't believe that) and is a perfect replacement (I don't miss chrome in the slightest).
customer_reviews.author: raphe

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price. I bought this when it was on sale to replace an iPad Air that had shattered. I decided that I wanted an Android tablet, as I prefer it to iOS. I also bought a 32GB SD card for it to add more storage to it. The display is crisp, there isn't as much bloatware as I thought there would be, and it is pretty smooth. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jamesgryffindor99

customer_reviews.title: Very good for kids or normal tablet usage--web browsing
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is still snappy even though it is a couple of years old. Very good for kids or normal tablet usage--web browsing, email, Netflix, etc. I don't play games on it, so can't rate that.
customer_reviews.author: m130palm

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Hard to go wrong with these tablets. This processes fine for any app ran. Looks bright and clean. Battery is about the same life as phone. No all day use as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Lex Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Still the best rablet on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra $$ and get this as opposed to some of the cheaper ones you see out there. Gorgeous screen and very fast processor that can handle advanced 3D games. Micro SD compatible to put most of your apps on to save on hard drive space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung tablets are the best
customer_reviews.text: Love it. One problem...the wall charger does not work. I had other Samsung chargers so it was not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Susan M

customer_reviews.title: Preset good
customer_reviews.text: A great tablet for the price. I only wish it came with data plans like the iPad and that the battery life was not so short. It has to be recharged frequently which is why I bought an iPad mini for when I go far away to specialist doctor appointments.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Tab S2
customer_reviews.text: Using it primarily with my Mavic Pro Quad-copter but it is really useful for showing friends video and photos...Not to large or small.
customer_reviews.author: Rick A. Coscarelli

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife after looking at several models on line and in stores. She loves it because it is roughly the same size as her old tablet and this is much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snappy
customer_reviews.text: Yep, it works---real good! Ultra-fast and reliable, the S2 does everything I need it to do and then some. I have no complaints whatsoever. If you're looking for a new tablet, buy it! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: MAX

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome tablet. Don't buy the S3 this thing is way better. I just don't understand why they don't offer the 4G LTE version in the US. Absolute shame
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This thing is super thin, the display is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super thin, the display is awesome, it's way faster than my old Tab A 7inch. So far I haven't found one thing I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: advertised model number was sent in expected condition. was unlocked and rootable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace another Galaxy Tab S2 that had died. Delivery was prompt and the condition was as described. I was able to set up and install everything from my old tablet easily. The battery seems a little weak, it burns through battery life much more quickly than my old tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Sound and Battery could be better
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is a toss up, I leave it for awhile and the battery is dead. Sound could be improved. Video is pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: This product works as it should. The magnet is strong enough to keep it closed properly, but still easy to open. It turns off the screen properly when you close it, and I have not experienced any of the difficulties mentioned by other reviewers. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elena L. Fiske

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Flight Navigation
customer_reviews.text: I am a pilot, and I use this tablet for navigation. I strap it to my leg, and pull up the navigation charts. Works very well, and I can find no faults with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beta

customer_reviews.title: Great product great size great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it is the right size and is fast enough for what I use it for. I use this tablet for music and giving speeches as well as reading on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to go!
customer_reviews.text: Good to go. Sealed up in original package. No questionable aspects of the transaction. This thing is super thin. I prefer it to the Mini 4 that I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Hektoer Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S2 tablet
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery, product received as advertised. Tablet is functioning fine thus far. Excellent seller and transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, even if a little outdated
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet. I typically prefer a pure Android experience. My prior tablet was the Nexus 10, which I loved for years. This was a nice upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: No more bulging biceps :)
customer_reviews.text: Several days of use and I am extremely pleased. The light weight and screen are just amazing! I wish I had bought a case with it but I have since remedied that. At first I wasn't a fan of briefing, the app present when you swipe right on the home screen, but that is changing. Do notice that when I have a lot of apps open it gets a little warm, but not uncomfortably. I'll post back her if I have problems. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne Basnett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great condition. Good upgrade from my previous tab s 8.4. Very responsive and fast. Great product 👍
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gerena

customer_reviews.title: No Longevity
customer_reviews.text: The unit operated fine for close to 1 year. Then, it simply died. There was no abuse and it was in an otterbox the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shuts down without warning
customer_reviews.text: Constantly shuts down for no reason and without warning. Really frustrating and no fix for it. The last Samsung product I'll buy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tablet - no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, It has taken the place of my MacBook Pro. It's small, convenient, quick, durable, and very easy to use. The WIFI "only" is not a problem. Connectivity to routers, cell phones, networks and Mac equipment is "quick Easy".
customer_reviews.author: Rand

customer_reviews.title: A really great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't ask for anything else in this tablet -- it does everything I want and looks gorgeous, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Games run smoothly with a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: Not really in it for photos or video, just a device to handle games. Fire Emblem Heroes runs much more smoothly compared to my phone. It has a slight chip in the upper left corner, but it's nothing too major. I was surprised to find out that there was an SD card already attached to it! 64 GB! Basically a free bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Quedado

customer_reviews.title: A vast improvement
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift replacing a Google Nexus. This was a huge upgrade and seems very well appreciated. Recipient is a techno-phobe however, so the tablet will never be stretched on performance.
customer_reviews.author: Don B

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for a great price. DO NOT order direct from Samsung! What a nightmare that was.
customer_reviews.author: CW10Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tablet. It's super lightweight and thin. One downside is battery life but that's what you get when you ask for light weight and thing tablet.
customer_reviews.author: STaRS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really liking this tablet! Came with MM, is fast and very lightweight!!
customer_reviews.author: andee

customer_reviews.title: I never knew I could like a tablet so much
customer_reviews.text: I never knew I could like a tablet so much. Great screen resolution and color, super fast. Love plugging in my flash drive to watch movies while I am stuck in airports.
customer_reviews.author: riskman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I've just barely scratched the surface of what ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've just barely scratched the surface of what this tablet can do. I use it to surf the net, do emails and play some casual games and it works perfect. It doesn't crash on me or anything. It has great color and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This tablet arrived in beautiful condition. The screen was perfect and not one ...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet arrived in beautiful condition. The screen was perfect and not one cosmetic blemish on the shell of the product. This is exactly what I expected for the price I paid. Thank you for not letting me down! Seller comes highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 8"; 32 GB Wifi Tablet (Black) SM-T713NZKEXAR
product_meta.description: Built for ultra-fast performance, the thin and lightweight Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 goes anywhere you go. Photos, movies and documents pop on a crisp, clear Super AMOLED display. Expandable memory lets you enjoy more of your favorite content. And connecting and sharing between all your Samsung devices is easier than ever. Welcome to life with the reimagined Samsung Galaxy Tab S2. Watch the world come to life on your tablet's Super AMOLED display. With deep contrast, rich colors and crisp details, you won't miss a thing. And whether you're in low light or sunlight, photos, videos, books and presentations always look great thanks to adaptive display technology. Dive into the blockbuster movies you can't wait to see. Switch between your favorite apps quickly and easily. The new and improved octa-core processor gives you the power and speed you need to see more and do more. Expand your tablet's memory from 32GB to up to an additional 128GB and enjoy more of your favorite music, photos, movies and games on the go with a microSD card. With Quick Connect, start a show on your Smart TV and, with the touch of a button, take it with you by moving it to your Galaxy Tab S2. Or send videos and photos from your tablet screen to your TV screen to share with everyone in the room. Work effortlessly between your Samsung tablet and Samsung smartphone with SideSync. Quickly drag and drop photos between devices. And even respond to a call from your smartphone right on your tablet screen.
feature_bullets: 32 GB Flash Memory, 3 GB RAM Memory
Battery Type and Size- Li-Ion 4,000 mAh, Music Play Time- Up to 74 hours, Video Play Time- Up to 14 hours, Internet Use Time- Up to 10 hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars476 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
